title: Divya Jhumar Jhumkaalu: Exquisite Diamond & Pearl Embellished Gold Earrings
materials: Creamy Yellow hue). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately designed openwork Jhumka structure adorned with delicate diamond settings. The upper stud features a floral motif studded with diamonds. The jhumka bell boasts a filigree pattern embellished with strategically placed sparkling diamonds. Dangles of creamy yellow South Sea pearls are suspended at the base, each crowned with a miniature gold accent. The design beautifully marries traditional aesthetics with contemporary detailing.
colors: Predominantly Gold with accents of white from the diamonds and creamy yellow from the pearls.
occasions: or any grand celebration. Adds a touch of timeless elegance to both traditional South Indian attire and modern evening wear.
description: These 'Divya Jhumar Jhumkaalu' embody the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. The use of high-quality gold, dazzling diamonds, and lustrous pearls ensures a luxurious and enduring piece. The intricate design and Hyderabadi polish highlight exceptional craftsmanship, making this a truly special heirloom-worthy possession. The lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, even for extended periods.
